dict.string: Just Walk uses your location to track your walk route on the map.
Just Walk uses your location to track your walk route, even when the screen is locked.
Just Walk uses motion sensors to count your steps in real-time during walks.
JustWalk reads your step count and walking distance to track your daily progress.
JustWalk saves your walking workouts to Apple Health.
Just Walk saves walk summary images to your photo library when you choose to save them.
